translations: 品尝；尽情享受，充分体验
乐趣；味道，气味；（尤指坏的）意味

sentences.sentence: I wanted to savour every moment.
sentences.translation: 我要细心品味，一刻也不错过。

sentences.sentence: For Emma, life had lost its savour.
sentences.translation: 对埃玛来说，生活已失去乐趣。

sentences.sentence: Alternatively, savour high-altitude views - stratocirrus permitting -from the observation deck in the World Financial Center.
sentences.translation: 在没有云雾的日子里，可以登上环球金融中心的观景台去欣赏高空美景。
